metadata.title: CVE-2024-24863 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In malidp_mw_connector_reset, new memory is allocated with kzalloc, but nocheck is performed. In order to prevent null pointer dereferencing, ensurethat mw_state is checked before calling__drm_atomic_helper_connector_reset.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
